original_title: 13 office trains to operate as per usual tomorrow despite strike
original_body_lines: For the convenience of commuters, 13 office train services will operate at the usual time in the schedule tomorrow (March 15) despite the planned multisectoral token strike.
Accordingly, the relevant trains will operate from Avissawella, Chilaw, Rambukkana, Ganewatte, Mahawa, Kandy, Beliatta, Galle, Aluthgama, and Kalutara-South to Colombo.
Meanwhile, police officers will be deployed to ensure the safety of passengers and the railway employees who report to work, the PMD noted.
